price: Mbavu zao zinaachana na vitanda kwa kumwomba Mola wao Mlezi kwa khofu na kutumaini, na hutoa kutokana na tulivyo waruzuku.
arabic: تَتَجَافَىٰ جُنُوبُهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمَضَاجِعِ يَدۡعُونَ رَبَّهُمۡ خَوۡفٗا وَطَمَعٗا وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
footnotes: Mbavu zao zinabambatuka na vitanda vyao, yaani wanaacha usingizi wao, kwa kumwomba Mola wao Mlezi kwa kuikhofu ghadhabu yake, na kutumai rehema yake; na ambao kutokana na mali tuliyo wapa wanatoa kwa ajili ya mambo ya kheri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: tatajāfā junūbuhum ʿani al-maḍājiʿi yadʿūna rabbahum khawfan waṭamaʿan wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
